data.text: Don me, ya Ubangiji, kake tsaya can da nesa?
Cikin fariyarsa mugun mutum yakan cuci marasa ƙarfi,
Yakan yi taƙama da ƙulle-ƙullen zuciyarsa;
Cikin ɗaga kai mutum ba ya neman Allah;
Yakan ce wa kansa, “Ba abin da zai girgiza ni;
Bakinsa ya cika da zage-zage da ƙarairayi da kuma barazana;
Yakan yi kwanto kusa da ƙauyuka;
Yakan yi kwanto a ɓoye kamar zaki.
Yakan ragargaza waɗanda suka shiga hannu, su fāɗi;
Yakan ce wa kansa, “Ai, Allah ya manta;
Ka tashi, Ubangiji! Ka hukunta miyagu, ya Allah.
Don me mugun mutum zai ƙi Allah?
Amma kai, ya Allah, kana gani wahala da baƙin ciki;
Ka karye hannun mugaye da kuma mugun mutum;
Ubangiji Sarkin har abada abadin ne;
Kakan ji, ya Ubangiji sha’awar mai shan wahala;
kana kāre marayu da waɗanda aka danne,
